name: Polter Guest Alpha
description:
Welcome to the Spooky Town of Angston where local "Not a Bar" owners Yula Jean and Hector have their work cut out for them.

A point and click adventure just use your mouse to click on what you want to interact with.

If you can take the time to fill out our survey it would be greatly appreciated!

https://forms.gle/iG4jfKYZdvER5Wi19

Made as part of George Mason University's Game Design Capstone Spring 2021 by the group  "Save Point B"

Anna Burgay- Sound

Shannon Chong- Dialog Portraits and UI art

Toni Conge- Overworld Programming and Project Lead

Andrew DePorter- 3D modeling and Level Design

Ian Elquiero- Overworld Sprites, Item Sprites and 3D textures 

Antonio Fuller- Sound

Paul Hinkiker-  Sound

Connor Hoss- Design 

Devan Hutzell- Minigame Programming

Samuel Lister- World Design

Grace Maldoven- 3D Modeling and UVing

Paul Piccione- Mentor and Professor

Additional Help

Doug Drury- Voices of Hector, S.S.Spooktin and Necropantcer

Rose Gorgone - Voices of Yula Jean and Gabrielle Lailah Temperance
